description: Aokiji throws a ball of ice that freezes opponents on contact, encasing them in an unbreakable ice block. However, the technique proved ineffective against Whitebeard's vibration powers.

firstUse.context: Aokiji used Ice Ball attempting to freeze Whitebeard during their battle at Marineford, but Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi vibrations prevented him from being frozen.

limitations.limitation: Cannot freeze vibrations or earthquake-based powers
limitations.description: Whitebeard's Gura Gura no Mi vibrations prevented the Ice Ball from fully freezing him.
